initialWait.comment: Time to wait before first repositioning [ms]

noAdvancedPassTargetsWaitTime.comment: Time to wait before repositioning if supporter doesn't have any advanced pass targets [ms]

topRatingThreshold.comment: Bot will move to better positions if his current advanced pass targets are ranked lower than this threshold

tigersFieldReach.comment: The upper part of our field where supporters are allowed to locate themselves

maxIterations.comment: Maximum number of random generated positions

catchRadius.comment: Radius the bot uses to catch incoming balls

catchLookahead.comment: Lookahead of the defender to catch an incoming ball

chipKickDecisionDistance.comment: Security Dist [mm] - Distance around the penalty area. If the ball is inside this area the keeper tries to kick it away

chipKickDecisionVelocity.comment: Speed of the ball [m/s] - If the ball is slower, the bot will try to kick it out of the penalty area.

maxRelativeDistToGoalLine.comment: Dist [mm] - The distance to the goal line from the initial keeper position

maxSplineLength.comment: Dist [mm] - Longest spline to be computed for the keeper.

maxSplineLength:GRSIM.comment: Dist [mm] - Longest spline to be computed for the keeper.

safetyAroundPenalty.comment: Dist [mm] - Distance around the penalty area where the bot is allowed to block.

safetyAroundPenaltyKickType.comment: Dist [mm] - Distance around the penalty area, inside the bot will pass controlled, outside the bot will just shoot

positioningPreAiming.comment: Dist [mm] - distance to ball before aiming

shootingAngle.comment: Defines shooting-angle between bot and keeper

preDistance.comment: distance to penArea mark on preparation

ignoreKeeperMovement.comment: disables the shooter skill completely and uses KickSkill

timeToShoot.comment: the time until the shoot is done in ms

movementSpeed.comment: choose the flag that should be used

waitingTime.comment: Time [ms] to wait before doing the chipkick

dist2Ball.comment: Dist [mm] to ball in prepare state

ballAtDestTol.comment: Dist [mm] to ball when it is considered to be at its destination
